metadata.title: Morvarid Beauty | Master Hairstylist in Thornhill
metadata.description: With over 20 years of experience, Morvarid specializes in balayage, curly hair, lived-in hairstyles, and vibrant color. Modern Cuts. Clean Style. Effortless Beauty.

hero.tagline: Modern Style. Clean Cuts. Effortless Beauty.

about.intro: Morvarid is a Toronto-based hair and makeup artist known for creating modern, polished looks.
about.heading: Meet Morvarid
about.bio1: With 22 years behind the chair, Morvarid brings artistry and precision to every appointment. Known for dimensional color balayage and highlights that catch light beautifully, she creates looks that are modern yet timeless.
about.bio2: Her expertise extends to smoothing and repair treatments including keratin and hair botox, restoring health and manageability to even the most stressed strands. Every haircut is executed with precision, finished with styling that elevates the final look.
about.bio3: For weddings, engagements, and special events, Morvarid delivers the complete package coordinating hair and makeup so you feel confident, camera-ready, and naturally beautiful.
about.quote: Every client is different. I listen first, then create something that's uniquely you.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: A selection of our most popular services. Prices may vary based on hair length and density.
pricing.disclaimer: Complimentary consultation available for colour and treatment services.
